-------------------------------Vivek Nanda Joins AECOM--------------------------------
AECOM is delighted to announce that Vivek Nanda has joined as Principal in the Planning, Design and Development Group. Based in London, Vivek who was Partner at Alan Baxter & Associates will be focusing on the UK market and help in developing AECOMâ€™s business in India. He will also have an involvement in other growing economies.
A recognized urbanist, he has led strategic urban design and transport / infrastructure projects, significant masterplans and regeneration strategies, heritage characterizations, streetscape and public realm design. Sustainable development and good place-making is the core philosophy which underpins all his work. He has authored design guides and design codes which constitute national best practice and is a Design Review Panel Member for organizations including Transport for London and the South East Regional design Panel in the UK. He was a panel member for the Strategic Urban Design Panel and Enabling Panel for CABE and continues to be an Academician for the Academy of Urbanism . He works for both the private and public sectors, and, is consultant to various international agencies.
